titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Ladies Aid Societies records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes, histories, and other records of ladies aid societies taken from the records of Bethlehem United Church of Christ, Zion Lutheran Church, and the Ladies Arbeiter Aid Society, all of Ann Arbor, Michigan.

corpname.primary_name: Bethlehem United Church of Christ (Ann Arbor, Mich.)
Ladies Arbeiter Aid Society (Ann Arbor, Mich.)
